unnormalised: Borem, konnem tor mhaka Bharoti shikshonik sandarbhanim LaTeX vaparchya vishayant prashn kelo, ani ten mun mazyak mazyach shaleyache divas ugddas dile. Tedna, ami sadhi kalkulator vapartale ani hatanim समीकरण (samikarn) boroitale. Kalpana kara tumche mitrank vargache uprant $$\int_{0}^{\infty} e^{-x^2} dx = \frac{\sqrt{\pi}}{2}$$ sarkhem kain tor sangache asa – tem tumchi notebook-iche nimane panar netke boroilear kitlem bore distelem!
normalised: Borem, konnem tor mhaka Bharoti-i xikxonnik sandarbhant L-A-T-E-X vaprunche vixayant vicharlem, ani ten mun mhaka mhojeach xallechea disanchem yead ailem. Tea vellar, ami sadhi kalkulettor vapartale ani hatanuch samikronnam boroitale. Kalpna kara ki integral zero thaun infinity meren e to the power of negative x squared d x equals square root of pi divided by two ashem tumcheam ixttank class uprant sangonakai- tumchea note bukachya nimnnea panacher te neatlean boroun!

unnormalised: Atam, online varga zayti zaitay, khas korun 2020 uprant, LaTeX kharokharupayogi zata. Udharanakhatir, ek vidhyarthi quadratic equation $ax^2 + bx + c = 0$ sodoyta mhunn kalpana kara. Te LaTeX vaprun aplya steps ashe dakhouk shaktai: $$x = \frac{-b \pm \sqrt{b^2 - 4ac}}{2a}$$. Faktu scribbling korun dakhovnayat tenka he zaituch netke distelem.
normalised: Atam, online classes sadharanponnan vaddtat, khas korun don hazar ani visanchea uprant, L-A-T-E-X khoreanuch upyogi asta. Udaharanak, ek vidhyarthi quadratic equation a x squared plus b x plus c equals zero sodait asa mhunn kalpna kara. Te L-A-T-E-X vaprun aple pavl dakhovunk xaktat: x equals negative b plus or minus square root of b squared minus four a c all divided by two a. Tem fokot skribbling korun dakhovnchea poros khub spasht zata.

unnormalised: Mhaka ugddas asa mun mazyak dhaktulyak bhavak IIT entrance examakhatir toyari karunk modot keli. Taka eigenvalues ani eigenvectors sarkhe complex concepts samjun ghevpak lagtale. Hem netken dakhovpak $$\begin{bmatrix} a & b \\ c & d \end{bmatrix}$$ sarkhe commands vaprun easy zata. Agar to hatanim netken boroileak tras bhogtalo. Professor-an Overleaf collaborative problem-solving-akhatir vaparunk sanglem, jen ekdom bore asa.
normalised: Mhaka yead asa mhojean mhojea lhan bhavak tachi I-I-T provex porikshek toyari korunk modot kel'li. Taka eigenvalues ani eigenvectors sarkhea zonttil vicharanchya vixoyant somzon ghevchem poddtalem. Beginning b matrix a ani b ani c ani d end b matrix sarkhea commandanchi vapari korun hi dakhovnneatlean dakhoup khub sompem zata. Aadhi to hatan neatlean borounk trasbadd zatalo. Professoranui collaborative problem-solving khatir Overleaf vaprunk suchoilem, jem ashcharya zata.

unnormalised: Nimannem, poilech kiteak trasachi dista, LaTeX ganit notation sangatim deal karunk zankaim ekdam shaktiche sadhan. Tum 10ve klasiche vidhyarthi assa vo IISc-che research scholar, LaTeX shiklear ganit vichar netkan sangatim sangatim dakhoupak ekdam bore poddta. Mun suchoytam tu online tutorials dekhun basics samajun ghe.
normalised: Nixkarxak, suruvatint tem bhayanak dista, L-A-T-E-X ganiti notation-achem kam' korunchea konnakai ek bollaxali sadhan zata. Tum class tenth-intlo vidhyarthi asat vo I-I-S-C-intlo research scholar, L-A-T-E-X xikon tumchi ganiti vicharanchi sandesh viksit korchi kshamata khub vaddoita. Hanv suchoytam ki suruvaik thoddea online tutorialamni basic grahun ghevchem.
